channel.title: Posts on Sabhrant's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sabhrant's Blog

item.title: Introduction Poison
item.description: Poison is a clean, professional Hugo theme designed to captivate your readers. It’s also tiny and privacy conscious. No JavaScript frameworks, icon packs, or Google fonts. No ads or trackers polluting your console window. We kept things simple. A little vanilla JavaScript, a dash of CSS, and the power of Hugo. All the static assets for the site (JS files, CSS, and fonts) are located within the theme’s /assets/ directory. That way you know exactly what’s going onto your site.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcome to the blog. Hi there, thanks for visting the blog. Hope you find something of your interest here.
